column5: It looks like the <Power of Stars>
...If we hurry, we should be able to overtake them!
You are his right-hand man, it seems.
You are purposely meddling in our affairs,
and getting in our way, it seems...
Hmph, you certainly have strange tastes.
Before that, we will take back the
<Master Gear> from you here and now!
That's why I'm saying you're slow.
It's not that I've "come" to shut it down.
With this, the entire continent is...
Ah, the Power of Stars stopped...!!
Hmph, it is as you see...
With this, my business here is finished.
I will deal with you two
So that's all you have to offer,
a little better than you, right?
like lose to someone like you...
There's no way I can lose!
As for everything in this world,
it has nothing to do with you, doesn't it.
I do have a connection with it!
If it's the <Master Gear> you want,
it remains in the altar on the top floor...
or not, it's impossible for you to stop
I forgot to give my name.
it is to return the world to its true form...
Noi, do you have any idea about this──
That has to be a lie!
Could it be, that masked man just now...
Do you have an idea about him?
Why is Master Selam helping Zext?
all we can do is think about it.
For now, we need to take back
Let's go to the altar, Nayuta!
